Question: Link Robotics CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Doosan Robotics

Oscar the Sorter

- AI-powered recycling cobot
- Part of the Dart-Suite robot ecosystem
- Utilizes the Qualcomm Robotics RB5 Platform
- Incorporates a suite of smart sensors
- Aims to turn smart homes into "Zero Labor Homes"
- Can organize smart devices and monitor pets
- Utilizes generative AI for more natural conversation
- Offers a range of 186 miles
- Can plug into DC fast chargers
- Two-seater design with a back seat for a passenger
